scenes.action_text: ANALYZE THIS Screenplay by PETER TOLAN and HAROLD RAMIS and KENNETH LONERGAN Story by KENNETH LONERGAN and PETER TOLAN July 1998 Draft FOR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY 1 CREDITS BEGIN OVER BLACK. 1 DOMINIC MANETTA a man in his 70s, narrates nostalgically OVER a MONTAGE of related news photos. MANETTA (V.O.) 1957 was a big year. The Russians put
